==== Comments ====
* '''1''': It makes Ubuntu and Israel be equal, and not one inside the other or the opposite. - ''Yochai''
* '''8''': Israeli flag next to the Ubuntu logo is best IMO. - ''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~uri.shabtay|Uri.Shabtay]]</nowiki>''
* The differences between 20-21 & 23-24:
* The combo of Hebrew Letters, Israeli blue color and Ubuntu logo in <nowiki>[[#line-55|25]]</nowiki> is pretty nice. - yuvilio
* The combo of Hebrew Letters, Israeli blue color and Ubuntu logo in <nowiki>[[#line-55|25]]</nowiki> is pretty nice. - status0
"The vertical placement. With the first of each pair, the center of the
star is aligned with the x-height of the letters (look at the upper end
of the "u"). With the second of each pair the same is true for the upper
vertical stroke of the star.

The first option resembles the position of the circle in the main Ubuntu
logo. The second option with lower placement is just an obvious
alternative that makes the logo more compact.

Now with the distance of several hours since I made them, I would advice
to choose the higher placement for consistency with the main logo and
because it looks more optimistic."
